title: Showcase
subtitle: Huge images help promote your business. Optional "Buy Now" buttons can convert this app into your social store.
bells_whistles: Our Photo Showcase app features a slick 10 image slider that highlights and showcases your best visual assets. Show off your products, your team, or create a custom slide show.

features.title: Buy Now Button
features.description: Add an optional link to your eCommerce site so your Facebook fans are one click away from your online store.

features.title: Easy Design
features.description: Our Content Management System makes creating, editing, and updating your Facebook app simple. Easy editing tools let you change directions quickly - not holding you to your "web guy's" schedule.

features.title: Share Management
features.description: Every North Social app includes the ability to customize the image and messaging that gets posted to a user's wall when they share your Page.

features.title: Commenting is Good
features.description: Optional comments box encourages the chatter around your content, driving additional awareness and traffic to the Page. Comments can also be turned off for a cleaner viewing experience.
